languages.text: "...сегодня при высочайшем собрании {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензор{/g} распечатал хранилища священных схем и предал очистительной утилизации те, что были названы избыточными или еретичными. Сегодня были утрачены десятки Установленных Процедур, на смену которым придут другие, о которых Фабрикатор-Цензор доложит тем, кто проявит наибольшую благочестивость в служении Истине... но хранилища данных не содержат понятия "истины" — не было ли, да простит меня Всеведущий и Блаженный, ошибки в исчислениях Фабрикатор-Цензора, и в самом деле он хотел глаголить о Поиске Знания?.."

"...today, at the supreme assembly, the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} unsealed the vaults of the sacred designs and committed those deemed redundant or heretical to purifying disposal. Today, dozens of Standard Procedures were lost, to be replaced by new ones, which the Fabricator-Censor will deliver to those who demonstrate the greatest devotion to serving the truth... but the data-banks contain no notion of 'Truth' — could there have been, may the All-Knowing One, the Gracious Keeper, forgive me, an error in the Fabricator-Censor's calculations, and he meant to say, 'serving the Quest for Knowledge'?"
languages.original_text: "...сегодня при высочайшем собрании {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Фабрикатор-Цензор{/g} распечатал хранилища священных схем и предал очистительной утилизации те, что были названы избыточными или еретичными. Сегодня были утрачены десятки Установленных Процедур, на смену которым придут другие, о которых Фабрикатор-Цензор доложит тем, кто проявит наибольшую благочестивость в служении Истине... но хранилища данных не содержат понятия "истины" — не было ли, да простит меня Всеведущий и Блаженный, ошибки в исчислениях Фабрикатор-Цензора, и в самом деле он хотел глаголить о Поиске Знания?.."

traits.locale_text: "...today, at the supreme assembly, the Fabricator unsealed the vaults of the sacred designs and committed those of them deemed redundant or heretical to purifying disposal. Today, dozens of Standard Procedures were lost, to be replaced by new ones, which the Fabricator will deliver to those who demonstrate the greatest devotion in serving the truth... but the data banks contain no notion of 'truth' — could there have been, may the All-Knowing One, the Gracious Keeper, forgive me, an error in the Fabricator's calculations, and he meant to say, 'serving the Quest for Knowledge'?"

"...today, at the supreme assembly, the Fabricator unsealed the vaults of the sacred designs and committed those of them deemed redundant or heretical to purifying disposal. Today, dozens of Standard Procedures were lost, to be replaced by new ones, which the Fabricator will deliver to those who demonstrate the greatest devotion in serving the truth... but the data banks contain no notion of 'truth' — could there have been, may the All-Knowing One, the Gracious Keeper, forgive me, an error in the Fabricator's calculations, and he meant to say, 'serving the Quest for Knowledge'?"

"...today, at the supreme assembly, the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator{/g} unsealed the vaults of the sacred designs and committed those deemed redundant or heretical to purifying disposal. Today, dozens of Standard Procedures were lost, to be replaced by new ones, which the Fabricator will deliver to those who demonstrate the greatest devotion to serving the truth... but the data banks contain no notion of 'Truth' — could there have been, may the All-Knowing One, the Gracious Keeper, forgive me, an error in the Fabricator's calculations, and he meant to say, 'serving the Quest for Knowledge'?"

"...today, at the supreme assembly, the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} unsealed the vaults of the sacred designs and committed those deemed redundant or heretical to purifying disposal. Today, dozens of Standard Procedures were lost, to be replaced by new ones, which the Fabricator-Censor will deliver to those who demonstrate the greatest devotion to serving the truth... but the data-banks contain no notion of 'Truth' — could there have been, may the All-Knowing One, the Gracious Keeper, forgive me, an error in the Fabricator-Censor's calculations, and he meant to say, 'serving the Quest for Knowledge'?"

languages.text: “……今天，在最高集会上，{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}打开了神圣设计的保险库，净化了那些被认为是冗余或异端的设计。今天，我们失去了几十个标准程序，这些标准程序将由新的程序取代。铸造审查师将会把这些程序交付给那些侍奉真理、愿意为了真理付出一切的信徒们……然而，数据库中却并没有关于‘真理’的概念。愿全知之神，仁慈的守护者原谅我，会不会是铸造审查师的计算中存在错误，而且，他想说的话是不是‘为了求知远征’？”
languages.original_text: "...today, at the supreme assembly, the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} unsealed the vaults of the sacred designs and committed those deemed redundant or heretical to purifying disposal. Today, dozens of Standard Procedures were lost, to be replaced by new ones, which the Fabricator-Censor will deliver to those who demonstrate the greatest devotion to serving the truth... but the data-banks contain no notion of 'Truth' — could there have been, may the All-Knowing One, the Gracious Keeper, forgive me, an error in the Fabricator-Censor's calculations, and he meant to say, 'serving the Quest for Knowledge'?"

traits.locale_text: “……今天，在最高集会上，{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}铸造审查师{/g}打开了神圣设计的保险库，净化了那些被认为是冗余或异端的设计。今天，我们失去了几十个标准程序，这些标准程序将由新的程序取代。铸造审查师将会把这些程序交付给那些侍奉真理、愿意为了真理付出一切的信徒们……然而，数据库中却并没有关于‘真理’的概念。愿全知之神，仁慈的守护者原谅我，会不会是铸造审查师的计算中存在错误，而且，他想说的话是不是‘为了求知远征’？”

languages.text: «... hoy, en la asamblea suprema, el {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g} abrió las cámaras de los diseños sagrados y encomendó aquellos que consideró redundantes o heréticos a la purificación. Hoy se han perdido docenas de Procesos Estándar, que serán reemplazados por otros nuevos, los cuales el fabricator-censor enviará a aquellos que demuestren la mayor devoción por el servicio a la verdad... pero las bases de datos no contienen la noción de la "Verdad"; ¿puede haber habido, si me perdona el atrevimiento el Guardián Benévolo y Omnisciente, un error en los cálculos del fabricator-censor, y quisiera decir este "servicio a la búsqueda del conocimiento"?».
languages.original_text: "...today, at the supreme assembly, the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} unsealed the vaults of the sacred designs and committed those deemed redundant or heretical to purifying disposal. Today, dozens of Standard Procedures were lost, to be replaced by new ones, which the Fabricator-Censor will deliver to those who demonstrate the greatest devotion to serving the truth... but the data-banks contain no notion of 'Truth' — could there have been, may the All-Knowing One, the Gracious Keeper, forgive me, an error in the Fabricator-Censor's calculations, and he meant to say, 'serving the Quest for Knowledge'?"

traits.locale_text: «... hoy, en la asamblea suprema, el {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censor{/g} abrió las cámaras de los diseños sagrados y encomendó aquellos que consideró redundantes o heréticos a la purificación. Hoy se han perdido docenas de Procesos Estándar, que serán reemplazados por otros nuevos, los cuales el fabricator-censor enviará a aquellos que demuestren la mayor devoción por el servicio a la verdad... pero las bases de datos no contienen la noción de la "Verdad"; ¿puede haber habido, si me perdona el atrevimiento el Guardián Benévolo y Omnisciente, un error en los cálculos del fabricator-censor, y quisiera decir este "servicio a la búsqueda del conocimiento"?».

languages.text: 「…今日の最高議会で、{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}が神聖なる計画の扉を開き、あぶれた者や異端者の浄化作業に取り組まれた。本日は、何十もの標準的手順が姿を消して、ファブリケーター・センサーが真実のために誠心誠意働く者に届ける、新たな手順へと変わった…しかしデータバンクに『真実』という概念は存在しない…全能の者、慈悲深き守護者よ、いらっしゃるならばお許しを。これはファブリケーター・センサーの計算ミスで、『知識探求のために』と言いたかったのではないか？」
languages.original_text: "...today, at the supreme assembly, the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} unsealed the vaults of the sacred designs and committed those deemed redundant or heretical to purifying disposal. Today, dozens of Standard Procedures were lost, to be replaced by new ones, which the Fabricator-Censor will deliver to those who demonstrate the greatest devotion to serving the truth... but the data-banks contain no notion of 'Truth' — could there have been, may the All-Knowing One, the Gracious Keeper, forgive me, an error in the Fabricator-Censor's calculations, and he meant to say, 'serving the Quest for Knowledge'?"

traits.locale_text: 「…今日の最高議会で、{g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}ファブリケーター・センサー{/g}が神聖なる計画の扉を開き、あぶれた者や異端者の浄化作業に取り組まれた。本日は、何十もの標準的手順が姿を消して、ファブリケーター・センサーが真実のために誠心誠意働く者に届ける、新たな手順へと変わった…しかしデータバンクに『真実』という概念は存在しない…全能の者、慈悲深き守護者よ、いらっしゃるならばお許しを。これはファブリケーター・センサーの計算ミスで、『知識探求のために』と言いたかったのではないか？」

languages.text: "... heute hat der {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Zensor{/g} bei der obersten Versammlung die Hallen der heiligen Entwürfe geöffnet und alle überflüssigen und ketzerischen davon der reinigenden Entsorgung überstellt. Wir haben heute Dutzende von Standardprozessen verloren, die durch neue ersetzt werden, die der Fabricator-Zensor jenen überstellen wird, die die größte Hingabe an die Wahrheit zeigen ... aber die Datenbanken erwähnen keine 'Wahrheit' – der Allwissende, der hochverehrte Hüter möge mir verzeihen, aber könnte es einen Fehler in den Berechnungen des Fabricator-Zensors gegeben haben, sodass er eigentlich 'Hingabe an die Suche nach Wissen' meinte?"
languages.original_text: "...today, at the supreme assembly, the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} unsealed the vaults of the sacred designs and committed those deemed redundant or heretical to purifying disposal. Today, dozens of Standard Procedures were lost, to be replaced by new ones, which the Fabricator-Censor will deliver to those who demonstrate the greatest devotion to serving the truth... but the data-banks contain no notion of 'Truth' — could there have been, may the All-Knowing One, the Gracious Keeper, forgive me, an error in the Fabricator-Censor's calculations, and he meant to say, 'serving the Quest for Knowledge'?"

traits.locale_text: "... heute hat der {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Zensor{/g} bei der obersten Versammlung die Hallen der heiligen Entwürfe geöffnet und alle überflüssigen und ketzerischen davon der reinigenden Entsorgung überstellt. Wir haben heute Dutzende von Standardprozessen verloren, die durch neue ersetzt werden, die der Fabricator-Zensor jenen überstellen wird, die die größte Hingabe an die Wahrheit zeigen ... aber die Datenbanken erwähnen keine ‚Wahrheit’ – der Allwissende, der hochverehrte Hüter möge mir verzeihen, aber könnte es einen Fehler in den Berechnungen des Fabricator-Zensors gegeben haben, sodass er eigentlich ‚Hingabe an die Suche nach Wissen’ meinte?"

languages.text: « ... aujourd'hui, à l'occasion du processus suprême, le {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} a ouvert les chambres des desseins sacrés et condamné les inutiles et les hérétiques à une élimination purificatrice. En ce jour, des dizaines de Procédures Standards ont été perdues. Elles seront remplacées sous peu par celles que le fabricator-censeur communiquera aux plus zélés serviteurs de la Vérité... mais les banques de données ne contiennent aucune mention d'une quelconque "Vérité". Que l'Omniscient, le Bienveillant Gardien, me pardonne, mais se pourrait-il qu'une erreur se soit glissée dans les calculs du fabricator-censeur, et qu'il ait voulu parler des "serviteurs de la Quête de la Connaissance" ? »
languages.original_text: "...today, at the supreme assembly, the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} unsealed the vaults of the sacred designs and committed those deemed redundant or heretical to purifying disposal. Today, dozens of Standard Procedures were lost, to be replaced by new ones, which the Fabricator-Censor will deliver to those who demonstrate the greatest devotion to serving the truth... but the data-banks contain no notion of 'Truth' — could there have been, may the All-Knowing One, the Gracious Keeper, forgive me, an error in the Fabricator-Censor's calculations, and he meant to say, 'serving the Quest for Knowledge'?"

traits.locale_text: « ... aujourd'hui, à l'occasion du processus suprême, le {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}fabricator-censeur{/g} a ouvert les chambres des desseins sacrés et condamné les inutiles et les hérétiques à une élimination purificatrice. En ce jour, des dizaines de Procédures Standards ont été perdues. Elles seront remplacées sous peu par celles que le fabricator-censeur communiquera aux plus zélés serviteurs de la Vérité... mais les banques de données ne contiennent aucune mention d'une quelconque "Vérité". Que l'Omniscient, le Bienveillant Gardien, me pardonne, mais se pourrait-il qu'une erreur se soit glissée dans les calculs du fabricator-censeur, et qu'il ait voulu parler des "serviteurs de la Quête de la Connaissance" ? »

languages.text: "Bugün {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör{/g}, yüce mecliste kutsal tasarımların mahzenlerini açıp gereksiz veya sapkın sayılanları arındırdı. Bugün onlarca Standart Prosedür kaybedildi. Bunların yerini, Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün hakikate hizmet etmeye en büyük bağlılığı gösterenlere sunacağı yenileri alacak... Lakin veri bankalarının 'hakikat' gibi bir mefhumu yok. Her Şeyi Bilen, Merhametli Koruyucu beni affetsin, Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün hesaplamalarında bir hata olabilir mi? Aslında 'İrfan Arayışı'na hizmet' mi demek istedi?"
languages.original_text: "...today, at the supreme assembly, the {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Fabricator-Censor{/g} unsealed the vaults of the sacred designs and committed those deemed redundant or heretical to purifying disposal. Today, dozens of Standard Procedures were lost, to be replaced by new ones, which the Fabricator-Censor will deliver to those who demonstrate the greatest devotion to serving the truth... but the data-banks contain no notion of 'Truth' — could there have been, may the All-Knowing One, the Gracious Keeper, forgive me, an error in the Fabricator-Censor's calculations, and he meant to say, 'serving the Quest for Knowledge'?"

traits.locale_text: "...bugün, {g|Encyclopedia:Fabricator}Denetçi Fabrikatör{/g}, yüce mecliste kutsal tasarımların mahzenlerini açtı ve gereksiz veya sapkın sayılanları arındırmaya adadı. Bugün, Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün hakikate hizmet etmeye en büyük bağlılığı gösterenlere sunacağı yenileriyle değiştirilmek üzere düzinelerce Standart Prosedür kaybedildi... Lakin veri bankalarının 'hakikat' gibi bir mefhumu yok. Her Şeyi Bilen, Merhametli Koruyucu beni affetsin, Denetçi Fabrikatör'ün hesaplamalarında bir hata olabilir mi? 'İrfan Arayışı'na hizmet etmek' mi demek istedi?"
